original_text: So all the officials and people who entered into this covenant agreed that they would free their male and female slaves and no longer hold them in bondage. They agreed, and set them free.
korean_text: 이 계약에 가담한 고관들과 모든 백성이 각기 노비를 자유롭게 하고 다시는 종을 삼지 말라 함을 듣고 순복하여 놓았더니

sentences.original_text: So all the officials and people
agreed that they would free their male and female slaves
and no longer hold them in bondage
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 더 이상 그들을 억류하지 않기로 했다
